wikipedia_page.main: Willie Callaghan (born 9 December 1941) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for East Stirlingshire, Aberdeen, Albion Rovers and Stranraer in the Scottish Football League and Barnsley in the Football League.

response: * Willie Callaghan (footballer, born 1941), Scottish footballer (Aberdeen FC)
* Willie Callaghan (footballer, born 1967), Scottish footballer (Dunfermline Athletic, Walsall FC, Montrose FC, Livingston FC)
